edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff

Class TextLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditableTextLine

    public class TextLine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is comprised of constructors and methods used to store a line of text as a char array and manipulate it in specified ways.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int arrayCap
      This variable represents the size of each array created.
      static int DEFAULT_SIZE
      A constant that represents the default size of each array.
      int length
      A variable that represents the length of this TextLine

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextLine()
      This constructs an empty TextLine object with the default size constant as the capacity and sets the length to 0.
      TextLine(java.lang.String line)
      This constructs a TextLine object initialized to contain the same characters as in the argument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int capacity()
      Returns the current capacity of this TextLine
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object anObject)
      Returns true if this textLine has the same characters as the argument object
      int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment)
      This method returns the index position of the first occurrence of the fragment in the TextLine or -1 if the fragment isn't found.
      int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment, int fromIndex)
      This method returns the index position of the first occurrence of the fragment in the TextLine or -1 if the fragment isn't found.
      int length()
      This method returns the length of this TextLine, checks for null characters
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the contents of this TextLine represented as a Java String

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_SIZE
        A constant that represents the default size of each array. If it needs to widened it is done so by 80 each time.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • arrayCap

        public int arrayCap
        This variable represents the size of each array created.

      • length

        public int length
        A variable that represents the length of this TextLine

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextLine

        public TextLine()
        This constructs an empty TextLine object with the default size constant as the capacity and sets the length to 0.

      • TextLine

        public TextLine(java.lang.String line)
        This constructs a TextLine object initialized to contain the same characters as in the argument. The line length is set to the length of the argument, but the capacity of the internal array is set to the smallest multiple of the default constant that can store the line.
        Parameters:
        line - The line parameter is the string that is to be placed in the TextLine array.

    • Method Detail

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment)
        This method returns the index position of the first occurrence of the fragment in the TextLine or -1 if the fragment isn't found.
        Parameters:
        fragment - This is the string that is searched for within the TextLine \
        Returns:
        This returns the first instance of the fragment within the TextLine. If the fragment is not found within the TextLine, then a -1 value is returned.

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment,
                   int fromIndex)
        This method returns the index position of the first occurrence of the fragment in the TextLine or -1 if the fragment isn't found.
        Parameters:
        fragment - This is the string that is searched for within the TextLine object.
        fromIndex - This is the index from which the search for the fragment begins.
        Returns:
        This method returns an integer value of the first occurrence of the fragment from the starting index. If no match is found, then a -1 is returned.

      • length

        public int length()
        This method returns the length of this TextLine, checks for null characters
        Returns:
        returns the length of the TextLine object.

      • capacity

        public int capacity()
        Returns the current capacity of this TextLine
        Returns:
        This returns the value of the capacity variable of the TextLine object.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object anObject)
        Returns true if this textLine has the same characters as the argument object
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the contents of this TextLine represented as a Java String
